doc.after: Throughout his life, Caspersen was closely involved with the management of several universities and schools, serving on the directing boards of the Peddie School, Brown, and the Dean's Advisory Board at Harvard Law School.[4][15] In a 2008 interview, he stated that he believed education was "investment in the futureâan investment in human capital. I've been active in a range of other things, but education's always been my particular love".[52]
